mapper.insert: UPSERT INTO HOSPITAL.VIDEO_DIAGNOSE( "id", "patient_card_id", "doctor_id", "out_trade_no", "amount", "payment_status", "prepay_id", "transaction_id", "expect_start", "expect_end", "real_start", "real_end", "status", "create_time" ) VALUES( NEXT VALUE FOR HOSPITAL.VIDEO_DIAGNOSE_SEQUENCE, ${patientCardId}, ${doctorId}, #{outTradeNo}, ${amount}, 1, #{prepayId}, NULL, TO_DATE('${expectStart}'), TO_DATE('${expectEnd}'), NULL, NULL, 1, NOW() )
mapper.select: SELECT v."id" AS "id", v."out_trade_no" AS "outTradeNo", TO_CHAR(v."amount", '#00.00') AS "amount", v."payment_status" AS "paymentStatus", v."prepay_id" AS "prepayId", TO_CHAR(v."expect_start", 'yyyy-MM-dd HH:mm:ss') AS "expectStart", TO_CHAR(v."expect_end", 'yyyy-MM-dd HH:mm:ss') AS "expectEnd", v."status" AS "status", d."id" AS "doctorId", d."name" AS "doctorName", d."job" AS "job", ds."name" AS "subName", TO_CHAR(v."create_time", 'yyyy-MM-dd HH:mm') AS "createTime" FROM HOSPITAL.VIDEO_DIAGNOSE v JOIN HOSPITAL.DOCTOR d ON v."doctor_id" = d."id" JOIN HOSPITAL.MEDICAL_DEPT_SUB_AND_DOCTOR sd ON sd."doctor_id" = d."id" JOIN HOSPITAL.MEDICAL_DEPT_SUB ds ON sd."dept_sub_id" = ds."id" JOIN HOSPITAL.PATIENT_USER_INFO_CARD c ON v."patient_card_id" = c."id" JOIN HOSPITAL.PATIENT_USER u ON c."user_id" = u."id" WHERE u."id" = ${userId} ORDER BY v."id" DESC LIMIT ${length} OFFSET ${start}
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM HOSPITAL.VIDEO_DIAGNOSE v JOIN HOSPITAL.PATIENT_USER_INFO_CARD c ON v."patient_card_id" = c."id" JOIN HOSPITAL.PATIENT_USER u ON c."user_id" = u."id" WHERE u."id" = ${userId}
